publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2858 John Scott: Ayr Scottish Eagles—That the Parliament congratulates the players, staff and supporters of Ayr Scottish Eagles, Scotland’s only superleague ice hockey team, on their victory in the Blue Square.com Challenge cup final; further congratulates the team on its second place finish in the Sekonda Ice Hockey Superleague and resultant qualification for European competition next season and wishes the team every success in the forthcoming play-off competition; recognises the popularity of ice hockey as a spectator sport in Scotland, and calls on SportScotland to afford a higher priority to the sport in order that clubs may develop the wealth of young talent in the country with a view to participation in future Winter Olympic Games. Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith*

S1M-2858 John Scott: Ayr Scottish Eagles—That the Parliament congratulates the players, staff and supporters of Ayr Scottish Eagles, Scotland’s only superleague ice hockey team, on their victory in the Blue Square.com Challenge cup final; further congratulates the team on its second place finish in the Sekonda Ice Hockey Superleague and resultant qualification for European competition next season and wishes the team every success in the forthcoming play-off competition; recognises the popularity of ice hockey as a spectator sport in Scotland, and calls on SportScotland to afford a higher priority to the sport in order that clubs may develop the wealth of young talent in the country with a view to participation in future Winter Olympic Games. Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith
S1M-2858 Ayr Scottish Eagles (lodged on 7 March 2002) Mr Murray Tosh*, Phil Gallie*
S1M-2858 Ayr Scottish Eagles (lodged on 7 March 2002) Michael Russell*, David Mundell*
S1M-2858 Ayr Scottish Eagles (lodged on 7 March 2002) Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-2858 Ayr Scottish Eagles (lodged on 7 March 2002) Brian Adam*
